name: avi
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of 4 CPUs/12 GB of RAM available for the Avi Controller Service; and 1 CPU/2 GB RAM for Avi ServiceEngine.
postInstallNotes:
Avi DCOS Service has been successfully installed!
See http://kb.avinetworks.com for documentation.
postUninstallNotes:
Avi DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
See http://kb.avinetworks.com/system-cleanup-following-uninstall-from-mesos-dcos/ on how to cleanup persisted state
